text: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلْغَرْبِىِّ إِذْ قَضَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلْأَمْرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And you, [O Muhammad], were not on the western side [of the mount] when We revealed to Moses the command, and you were not among the witnesses [to that].
translation.id.indonesian: Dan tidaklah kamu (Muhammad) berada di sisi yang sebelah barat ketika Kami menyampaikan perintah kepada Musa, dan tiada pula kamu termasuk orang-orang yang menyaksikan.
